subtitle: the Federation and the Empire became known as the Orion Wars named such because most
of the fighting took place in and around the Orion system the War lasted for Millennia and
while there were trues and Times of Greater peace the general Trend was one of conflict
and countless Generations that grew up with war death slavery desperation and strife as
the normal for hundreds of Millennia the conflicts within the Orion constellation
wreaked havoc on new ous life-bearing planets it was often remarked that the night skies were
perpetually illuminated by Stellar explosions visible to the planet's dwellers over time a
multitude of inhabitants chose to flee seeking Refuge from the looming threat of subjugation
or Annihilation by the Empire such dire circumstances led to the fracturing of
